name: Mutant Mudds Super Challenge
description: There is only one game mode, and it is Super Challenge! With your trusty water-cannon and jetpack, guide Max through 40 levels and 5 bosses to reach your ultimate destination: the alien meteorite and source of all the mutant mudd malarkey!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: 1.8 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
